CustomField.description: Created as a part of SFS-4803
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Access to the end of the pipe may be possible, but with suitable precautions makes it difficult to cross and therefore deters people from doing so. - End 2 has been determined as the end from which the flows ends
CustomField.label: Access to Pipe End2

value.fullName: Possible i.e deterrents in place but access possible
value.label: Possible i.e deterrents in place but access possible

value.fullName: Easy. Deterrents in place but not substantial
value.label: Easy. Deterrents in place but not substantial
